programme.title: L'opéra
programme.desc: Danseuse étoile de Paris, Zoé, 35 ans vit dans l'excès après une carrière au sommet de son art. Sébastien, le nouveau directeur, menace de la renvoyer en raison des nombreuses fêtes et dissipations nocturnes. Elle décide alors de se battre pour conserver sa place.

programme.title: L'opéra
programme.desc: Pour défendre ses intérêts, Zoé fait appel à maître Delva, une avocate qui lui donne un seul conseil : être distribuée le plus possible. Pour cela, elle doit retrouver la forme.

programme.title: Insecure
programme.sub-title: S5 E7 Détente, okay ?

programme.title: Larry et son nombril
programme.sub-title: S11 E7 Irma Kostroski

programme.title: Boyhood
programme.desc: Mason, un garçon rêveur de 6 ans, habite avec sa sœur, Samantha, et sa mère, Olivia, dans une petite ville du Texas. Olivia, divorcée, tente de concilier, tant bien que mal, sa vie de femme avec celle de mère de famille. Une année s'est écoulée et la petite famille loge désormais à Houston. Alors qu'ils sont gardés par leur grand-mère maternelle, leur père, qui s'est installé en Alaska, passe un matin les prendre pour passer du temps avec eux. A la fin de la journée, les deux enfants constatent que les relations entre leurs parents ne sont pas apaisées.

programme.title: Take Shelter
programme.desc: Dans l'Ohio, Curtis LaForche vit modestement avec sa femme Samantha et leur petite fille sourde, Hannah. Fragile psychologiquement, Curtis est perturbé par des visions apocalyptiques. Persuadé de l'imminence d'un cataclysme, il s'est mis en tête de construire un abri contre les tempêtes dans le jardin. Même s'il consulte un psychologue, Samantha se fait du souci pour lui, d'autant qu'il engage beaucoup de frais pour réaliser son œuvre.

programme.title: L'angle mort
programme.desc: Fils de musiciens, Dominick Brassan a le pouvoir de devenir invisible. A près de 40 ans, Dominique passe beaucoup de temps avec sa compagne Viveka, avec laquelle il ne s'est néanmoins pas engagé outre mesure, et travaille comme modeste employé dans une boutique de guitares. Comprenant son potentiel, son patron veut le faire progresser, mais Dominick tien vraisemblablement à rester une place qui ne lui convient pas. Tout comme il cache à tous son don d'invisibilité qu'il n'assume pas du tout.

programme.title: Contre-enquête
programme.desc: Hélène Villon, journaliste d'investigation pour le journal « La République », reçoit un message sur son portable de Kevin Lannier. Ce militaire qu'elle avait interviewé à son retour d’Afghanistan dit vouloir lui parler rapidement. Mais quand elle arrive chez lui, il est trop tard. Le jeune homme a été retrouvé mort au pied de son immeuble. Il a chuté du toit. Alors que la police penche pour la thèse du suicide, Hélène, qui connaissait Kevin, décide de mener sa propre enquête. Lors des funérailles, elle aborde la petite amie de Kevin.

programme.title: Je sais tomber
programme.desc: Avec tout juste un sac plastique à la main, car ses affaires ont été volées, Kevin rentre chez ses parents en Picardie après un séjour à Barcelone. Sans argent, il se rend dans une agence d’intérim et commence à travailler dans une porcherie industrielle. Son père, avec qui il entretient des rapports compliqués, lui propose de l'employer dans son atelier de menuiserie mais Kevin préfère être indépendant. Percuté par une voiture, il rencontre Alice. La jeune femme qui travaille dans un cirque, l'attire. Kevin décide alors de s'initier à l'équitation acrobatique.

programme.title: L'innocent
programme.desc: En 1978, Théo est cantonnier dans une municipalité d'Ile-de-France. Sans éducation, sans parents, sans famille, il a été livré à lui-même jusqu'à l'âge adulte au point d'avoir un langage basique proportionnel à son développement intellectuel. Un jour, deux braqueurs lui proposent un petit boulot de surveillance lors d'un hold-up dans un magasin. Mais l'affaire tourne mal et se termine par la mort d'un gendarme. Le crime est imputé à Théo, qui n'a pas eu la présence d'esprit de s'échapper, contrairement aux deux braqueurs.

programme.title: Anomalisa
programme.desc: Michael Stone, auteur anglais, arrive en avion à Cincinnati pour donner une conférence sur son dernier ouvrage, «Comment puis-je vous aider à les aider». En vol, il se souvient de la lettre pleine de ressentiment que sa petite amie Bella lui avait envoyé, juste après leur rupture onze ans plus tôt. Arrivé à l'hôtel, alors que le souvenir de Bella le hante, il décide de l'appeler. Son ancienne compagne accepte de le retrouver mais leur dîner ne se passe pas vraiment comme Michael l'aurait cru.

programme.title: Blue Valentine
programme.desc: Dean et Cindy se sont aimés dès qu'ils se sont vus. La jeune femme vivait alors une relation tumultueuse avec Bobby, son petit ami de l'époque. Dean a su la séduire et la réconforter. Des années plus tard, leur couple bat sérieusement de l'aile. Dean n'est plus que l'ombre de lui-même. Sa femme, qui le tenait en haute estime, se désole de son manque d'ambition au point qu'elle ne supporte plus sa présence.

programme.title: Histoire d'un regard
programme.desc: Mariana Otero se souvient du moment où elle a reçu un livre de photographies de Gilles Caron, reporter à la fin des années 1960. Elle se souvient de son émotion en redécouvrant ces images qu'elle connaissait mais dont elle ignorait l'auteur et surtout sa sidération, quand elle a découvert le parcours du photographe, mort à 30 ans au Cambodge, alors que le pays venait de tomber aux mains des khmers rouges. Cette disparition précoce lui a rappelé celle de sa mère, morte au même âge, à la même période. C'est aussi la proximité de ces deux destins qui l'a incitée à dresser un portrait en images de Gilles Caron.

programme.title: Le grand alibi
programme.desc: Un homme volage, Pierre Collier, est assassiné lors d'un week-end de villégiature chez le sénateur Pagès. Claire, sa femme, est la principale suspecte car elle a été arrêtée près du corps de la victime, une arme en main. Pourtant l'inspecteur Grange découvre que cette arme n'est pas celle du crime et que quasiment tous les convives du week-end avaient une bonne raison de vouloir la mort de Pierre Collier.

programme.title: The Square
programme.desc: Christian, conservateur d'un musée d'art moderne de Stockholm, répond, après avoir passé une courte nuit, aux questions d'Anne, journaliste de télévision américaine. Peu de temps après, l'élégant quadragénaire se fait voler son téléphone portable en pleine rue. Il se rend ensuite à une réunion pour préparer la communication autour d'une future exposition, intitulée «The Square», qui doit questionner le public sur son rapport à l'altruisme. Dans la journée, aidé par son assistant Michael, il parvient à retrouver le signal émis par le GPS de son téléphone.

programme.title: Snow Therapy
programme.desc: La petite famille suédoise formée par Tomas, son épouse Ebba, et leurs deux enfants Vera et Harry, profite des sports d'hiver dans une station des Alpes françaises. Ces vacances basculent, quand une avalanche menace la famille et les autres vacanciers, qui prenaient du bon temps à la terrasse ensoleillée d'un restaurant. Tout le monde est sauf. Mais, peu de temps après l'événement, au cours d'un repas avec des connaissances, Ebba reproche à Tomas d'avoir pris la fuite sans se soucier des siens. Celui-ci, réfugié dans le déni, s’obstine à taire l’incident.

programme.title: You Cannot Kill David Arquette
programme.desc: Après avoir remporté le championnat du monde de lutte dans la catégorie des poids lourds en 2000, l'ancien acteur David Arquette tente l'exploit de remonter sur le ring à presque 50 ans. Ses amis et ses proches apportent leurs témoignages dans ce documentaire portrait.

programme.title: Succession
Succession
programme.sub-title: S3 E9 Jusqu'à ce que la mort nous sépare

programme.title: Insecure
programme.sub-title: S5 E8 Choix, okay ?

programme.title: Larry et son nombril
programme.sub-title: S11 E8 Qu'est-ce que j'ai fait ?

programme.title: Story Séries
programme.desc: Chaque semaine, Story Séries accueille les artistes qui forgent et racontent les grandes histoires du petit écran. Showrunners, scénaristes, comédien.ne.s, réalisateur.rices, tous partagent leur passion et leur travail avec Nora Bouazzouni. Story Séries, la première émission qui se met à la place de fans de séries.

programme.title: La prof de sport
programme.desc: Un couple fête son premier anniversaire de relation. Autour d'un gâteau et de fruits, il se mettent alors à jouer comme des gamins, un moment plein de romantisme, d'amour et de désir qui finit par une bonne baise comme au premier jour de leur rencontre.

programme.title: Very Bad Things
programme.desc: Kyle Fisher va épouser la belle mais très autoritaire Laura. Respectant la tradition, il part à Las Vegas enterrer sa vie de garçon avec ses amis de toujours, Charles, Robert, Michael et Adam. Dans un hôtel luxueux, ils se livrent à tous les excès et louent les services d'une strip-teaseuse. Mais Michael entraîne la fille dans la salle de bains et lui transperce accidentellement le crâne avec un portemanteau.

programme.title: Ça commence souvent par un je t'aime
La vie c'est pas un jeu
Diabolique
programme.desc: En 1997, une vieille famille de notable de province est réunie au grand complet dans le superbe château familial. Chacun a répondu à l'invitation à déjeuner d'Hélène pour évoquer la réfection du domaine, mais les débats deviennent houleux lorsqu'elle informe ses deux frères que les subventions habituellement allouées ont été coupées. Les deux hommes refusent de participer aux frais et s'en remettent à Hélène pour trouver une solution. Elle rencontre alors un certain Thomas Texier, un charmant trentenaire débordant d'énergie et d'attention qui s'impose rapidement comme un homme providentiel.

programme.title: La légende de Despereaux
programme.desc: Dans un royaume enchanté, la reine meurt, laissant le roi et leur fille, la princesse Petit Pois, inconsolables. Arrive une souris aux grandes oreilles : Despereaux Tilling. Ce dernier se lie avec la princesse, qui lui apprend à lire les livres plutôt qu'à les manger. Il découvre alors les contes de fées, pleins d'actions héroïques. Mais, à cause de cette amitié contre nature, Despereaux est banni par les siens et échoue dans le monde des rats. Dans cet univers cruel et malodorant, il rencontre un autre marginal : le rat Roscuro, gourmet sophistiqué et grand voyageur.

programme.title: L'affaire Percy
programme.desc: En 1998, Percy Schmeiser cultivateur de colza depuis des décennies dans le Saskatchewan canadien, reçoit un courrier de la société Monsanto, lui demandant de verser la somme de 19 000 dollars pour l'utilisation de semences brevetées. Percy, qui a toujours refusé d'en utiliser, est convaincu que ces semences ont accidentellement été intégrées à ses cultures par un cultivateur voisin. L'agriculteur, qui refuse de se laisser impressionner par la puissante firme, fait appel à Jackson Weaver, d'un modeste cabinet d'avocats, pour le représenter en justice.

programme.title: Cyril contre Goliath
programme.desc: Dans son appartement parisien entouré de ses enfants, l'écrivain Cyril Montana se souvient du village de Lacoste, dans le Luberon, où il passait enfant ses vacances d'été. Il se souvient aussi que ce village, dominé par le château du Marquis de Sade, a beaucoup intéressé le créateur et homme d'affaires Pierre Cardin, qui, en 2000, a commencé à y racheter le château, puis des maisons, jusqu'à 40, et des commerces, afin de le transformer en lieu culturel. Seulement ces acquisitions ne débouchent pas sur grand-chose et Lacoste est devenu peu à peu un village-musée.

programme.title: Hashtag Boomer
programme.sub-title: S1 E5 Famille n'est pas un mot, c'est une phrase

programme.title: Hashtag Boomer
programme.sub-title: S1 E6 TBT, comme ils disent

programme.title: Crazy, Stupid, Love
programme.desc: Quadragénaire, Cal vit depuis vingt-cinq ans avec sa femme Emily, qui lui a donné deux beaux enfants. Sa vie bascule le jour où il apprend que cette dernière l'a trompé. Cal décide de divorcer et devient un homme solitaire. Dans un bar, il rencontre Jacob, un séducteur professionnel qui accumule les conquêtes. Il accepte de prendre Cal sous son aile et de le transformer en don juan. Les résultats ne se font pas attendre.

programme.title: Un heureux événement
programme.desc: Etudiante en philosophie, Barbara Dray fait la connaissance de Nicolas Malle, qui travaille dans un vidéoclub. Il parvient à la séduire et ils s'installent ensemble. Lors de vacances, Nicolas convainc Barbara de faire un bébé. Un jour, la jeune femme annonce à Nicolas qu'elle est enceinte. Pendant sa grossesse, Barbara passe par tous les états. Et vient enfin le jour de l'accouchement, qui se déroule sans encombre. Mais c'est le début d'une véritable détresse pour Barbara, qui ne parvient pas à se faire à cette nouvelle vie.

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: Poon Shing Fung et Tung Cheuk Man, deux brillants officiers artificiers de la police de Hongkong, sont appelés sur de périlleuses opérations de déminage. A cours de l'une d'entre elles, Shing Fung se trouve pris dans le feu d'une violente explosion, le laissant amputé d'une jambe. Désormais aidé d'une prothèse et déterminé à retrouver sa mobilité, Poon suit un programme sportif intensif, mais quitte la police. Cinq ans plus tard, un jeune homme muni d'une ceinture d'explosif commet un attentat meurtrier dans un immeuble de la ville. Selon toute vraisemblance, il appartient à un mouvement terroriste.

programme.title: Zoo
programme.desc: En 1941, à Belfast, alors que l'Irlande, plusieurs fois bombardée, subit les ravages de la guerre, le zoo de Bellevue accueille un nouveau pensionnaire de poids, un éléphanteau. Familier du directeur, monsieur Shawcross, Tom, fils de George Hall, le vétérinaire du zoo, se précipite aussitôt pour rendre visite à l'animal, qu'il baptise bien vite Buster. Mais cette bonne nouvelle est vite assombrie par une autre, quand l'adolescent apprend que son père vient d'être mobilisé et part bientôt au front.

programme.title: JFK l'enquête
programme.desc: Après avoir consacré un long métrage de fiction à l'enquête menée sur l'assassinat de John Fitzgerald Kennedy, Oliver Stone se replonge 30 ans après dans le sujet pour y consacrer désormais un documentaire. A travers une série d'images d'archives, le réalisateur reconstitue d'abord la journée du 22 novembre 1963, à Dallas, avant de présenter les prémices de l'enquête qui allait être menée. La caméra d'Oliver Stone se retrouve ensuite à Dallas, 55 ans plus tard. Le cinéaste explique alors pourquoi il revient sur les lieux du crime, et se replonge dans le contexte de l'enquête.

programme.title: Zero Dark Thirty
programme.desc: Après le 11 Septembre, la CIA met en place des cellules de recherche pour localiser Ben Laden. La jeune Maya est ainsi envoyée au Pakistan. A l'ambassade, dans une ambiance tendue, elle rejoint l'équipe de Joseph Bradley. Là, elle rencontre Dan qui torture un prisonnier pour essayer d'obtenir des informations sur les réseaux islamistes. Ce dernier leur parle un jour d'Abu Ahmed, qui serait un proche de Ben Laden.

programme.title: Le secret des Kennedy
programme.desc: Frère de John et Bob Kennedy, Ted participe à une régate le week-end du 18 juillet 1969 sur l'île de Chappaquiddick. Après la course, le sénateur du Massachusetts se rend à une fête où sont présents, son cousin et les secrétaires qui ont participé à la campagne présidentielle de Bob Kennedy avant qu'il ne soit assassiné. Avec l'une d'entre-elle, Ted part faire une balade en voiture. Sur la route, il rate un virage et le véhicule tombe dans l'eau. Il en ressort vivant mais pas la secrétaire. Paniqué, Ted préfère prévenir son cousin plutôt que les secours.

programme.title: Michael Clayton
programme.desc: Employé dans un grand cabinet juridique new-yorkais, Michael Clayton arrange discrètement les histoires embarrassantes de clients fortunés. Bientôt, il doit gérer le cas d'un collègue dont le comportement pose problème. Dans une affaire qui oppose une multinationale à des fermiers victimes de produits dangereux, Arthur Edens semble avoir pris le parti des plaignants au lieu de défendre les intérêts de la firme.

programme.title: Je ne mange pas de ce pain-là
Pizou l'ours blanc, la traversée de la banquise
programme.desc: Dans l'Arctique canadien, le jeune Luke découvre un ourson polaire abandonné et se met en tête de retrouver sa mère. Pour y parvenir, l'adolescent demande de l'aide à Muktuk, un aventurier à moitié inuit qui connaît parfaitement le territoire des ours polaires. Dans cette nature isolée et hostile, les dangers sont nombreux.

programme.title: Hashtag Boomer
programme.sub-title: S1 E5 Famille n'est pas un mot, c'est une phrase

programme.title: Hashtag Boomer
programme.sub-title: S1 E6 TBT, comme ils disent

programme.title: Shaun le mouton
programme.desc: Shaun, un jeune mouton, grandit dans une petite ferme tenue par un éleveur aussi sympathique que myope. Mais, les journées puis les années passent, un peu répétitives et Shaun rêve de changer d'air. Avec d'autres animaux, le mouton organise un plan d'évasion. Après avoir détourné, avec l'aide précieuse du canard, l'attention de Blitzer, le chien de berger, Shaun et les autres moutons parviennent à endormir le fermier. Mais leur plan dérape et la caravane dans laquelle le fermier est endormi dévale la route. Blitzer tente alors de la rattraper. Peu de temps après, les moutons, livrés à eux-mêmes, comprennent qu'ils ont besoin du fermier. Shaun part en ville pour le retrouver.

programme.title: Salaud, on t'aime
programme.desc: Jacques Kaminski, photographe de guerre, s'installe dans les Alpes pour profiter paisiblement de sa retraite. Alors qu'il vient de quitter sa femme, il s'éprend peu à peu de Nathalie Beranger, l'agent immobilier qui lui a trouvé sa maison. Parallèlement, il tente, en vain, de faire venir ses quatre filles, Printemps, Eté, Automne et Hiver. Son meilleur ami et médecin, Frédéric Selman, qui séjourne chez lui, ment aux quatre filles : il affirme que Jacques est atteint d'une grave maladie, espérant les faire venir.

programme.title: Austin Powers
programme.desc: En 1967, à Londres, Austin Powers est un photographe de mode adulé des femmes et jalousé des hommes. Plus discrètement, il est aussi le meilleur agent secret au service de Sa Majesté. Un soir, son ennemi juré, le diabolique docteur Denfer, parvient à lui échapper à bord d'une fusée spatiale et ne trouve rien de mieux à faire que de se congeler. Son but ? Revenir terroriser le monde trente ans plus tard. Austin Powers décide d'en faire de même. En 1997, les deux adversaires reviennent à la vie et s'affrontent à nouveau dans un monde qui a beaucoup changé.

programme.title: Very Bad Things
programme.desc: Kyle Fisher va épouser la belle mais très autoritaire Laura. Respectant la tradition, il part à Las Vegas enterrer sa vie de garçon avec ses amis de toujours, Charles, Robert, Michael et Adam. Dans un hôtel luxueux, ils se livrent à tous les excès et louent les services d'une strip-teaseuse. Mais Michael entraîne la fille dans la salle de bains et lui transperce accidentellement le crâne avec un portemanteau.

programme.title: Sécurité rapprochée
programme.desc: Employé de la CIA, Matt Weston est chargé de surveiller un des locaux secrets de l'agence au Cap, en Afrique du Sud. Lassé du peu d'intérêt de sa mission, il aspire à plus de responsabilités. Au même moment, Tobin Frost, ex-agent accusé de vendre des renseignements confidentiels, est arrêté non loin de là. Il est conduit dans la planque que surveille Matt. Bientôt, un commando armé prend le local d’assaut.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: Les Bellas, une chorale a cappella de filles, viennent d'obtenir leur diplôme et rêvent d'un avenir prometteur, plein de belles opportunités. Mais les offres de travail sont peu nombreuses. Lors d'une soirée, Aubrey, la fille d'un militaire haut placé, parle aux autres membres du groupe d'un concert organisé en Espagne en soutien aux forces armées américaines. Sur place, les Bellas découvrent rapidement qu'elles sont en compétition avec trois autres formations musicales pour assurer la première partie de DJ Khaled lors de sa future tournée en Europe.

programme.title: Populaire
programme.desc: A la fin des années 50, Rose Pamphyle, qui s'est entrainée quelque temps dans l'épicerie familiale, vient d'être embauchée comme secrétaire dans le cabinet d'assurance de Louis Echard. Peu convaincu par ses talents de secrétaire mais épaté par sa rapidité, celui-ci décide d'inscrire la jeune femme à un concours de vitesse dactylographique. Après un premier échec, Louis propose à Rose de venir s'entraîner chez lui en vue de la prochaine compétition.

programme.title: The Big Short : le casse du siècle
programme.desc: Dans les années 1970, le métier de banquier n'était pas particulièrement à la mode, jusqu'à l'intervention de Lewis Ranieri, qui a mis à la mode les obligations hypothécaires. Un frénésie s'est emparée de la finance pendant une trentaine d'années, jusqu'à un arrêt brutal avec la crise mondiale de 2008. Jared Vennett explique comment un analyste financier et des investisseurs de Wall Street ont senti le vent tourner et parié sur l'échec d'un système voué à s'effondrer.

programme.title: Fin des programmes
programme.desc: Écrivain égoïste dépourvu d'esprit de famille, Alexandre perd son père, Jacques, foudroyé par une crise cardiaque. Mais Jacques ne disparaît pas vraiment et se manifeste à son fils sous la forme d'un fantôme avec lequel il dialogue en permanence. Tandis que les relations familiales se compliquent, tout le monde s'inquiète des changements de comportements d'Alexandre.

programme.title: Enfer blanc
programme.desc: Alors que le Conseil de l'Arctique est sur le point de signer un accord sur l'exploitation des ressources dans cette zone, un pétrolier suédois est retrouvé à la dérive. Celui-ci a été la cible d'une attaque au large du Groenland et tout son équipage a été pris en otage.

programme.title: Enfer blanc
programme.desc: On soupçonne que la Russie pourrait être responsable de l'attaque. D'énormes réserves de pétrole ont été découvertes dans la région et la Russie offre secrètement l'indépendance du Groenland en échange des droits de forage. C'est le rêve ultime du Groenland qui pourrait être brisé par le traité.

programme.title: Fin des programmes
programme.desc: Écrivain égoïste dépourvu d'esprit de famille, Alexandre perd son père, Jacques, foudroyé par une crise cardiaque. Mais Jacques ne disparaît pas vraiment et se manifeste à son fils sous la forme d'un fantôme avec lequel il dialogue en permanence. Tandis que les relations familiales se compliquent, tout le monde s'inquiète des changements de comportements d'Alexandre.

The Pacific Theatre of World War II, as seen through the eyes of several young Marines." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0374463/","name":"The Pacific","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmEwNmI1MjItNjNjYy00NDE5LWJiNTYtM2QxMTI5ZjllZTBhL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Pacific Theatre of World War II, as seen through the eyes of several young Marines.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0374463/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gezmek"},"dateCreated":"2010-09-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Well worth the time","reviewBody":"I enjoyed this series very much and can see why there has been so many comparisons with Band Of Brothers. My observation is that in The Pacific many of the characters lack depth and development. The result was that I cared less when ill befell them than I did in Band of Brothers. I think that the first episode could have contained a lot more time letting us get to know the characters better before throwing them into battle.\n\nThe battle scenes were done very well and played very realistically. All in all HBO has done it again. Without the HBO and Showtime I think that US grown TV drama would be pretty thin on the ground. The Pacific is well worth the time.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":106218,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2010-03-14","keywords":"world war two,pacific theater,japanese soldier,u.s. marine corps,horrors of war","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0197647/","name":"James Badge Dale"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001515/","name":"Joseph Mazzello"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0781218/","name":"Jon Seda"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040938/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005861/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0036575/"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Pacific: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3159819545","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc1NjM2NDUzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODgxMDczMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc1NjM2NDUzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODgxMDczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A 10-part mini-series ftelling the intertwined stories of three Marines during America's battle with the Japanese in the Pacific during World War II."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0374463, Title: The Pacific, --- Description: The Pacific: With James Badge Dale, Joseph Mazzello, Jon Seda, Ashton Holmes. The Pacific Theatre of World War II, as seen through the eyes of several young Marines." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0374463/","name":"The Pacific","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmEwNmI1MjItNjNjYy00NDE5LWJiNTYtM2QxMTI5ZjllZTBhL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Pacific Theatre of World War II, as seen through the eyes of several young Marines.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0374463/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"gezmek","dateCreated":"2010-09-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Well worth the time","reviewBody":"I enjoyed this series very much and can see why there has been so many comparisons with Band Of Brothers. My observation is that in The Pacific many of the characters lack depth and development. The result was that I cared less when ill befell them than I did in Band of Brothers. I think that the first episode could have contained a lot more time letting us get to know the characters better before throwing them into battle.\n\nThe battle scenes were done very well and played very realistically. All in all HBO has done it again. Without the HBO and Showtime I think that US grown TV drama would be pretty thin on the ground. The Pacific is well worth the time.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":106218,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2010-03-14","keywords":"world war two,pacific theater,japanese soldier,u.s. marine corps,horrors of war","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0197647/","name":"James Badge Dale","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001515/","name":"Joseph Mazzello","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0781218/","name":"Jon Seda"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040938/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005861/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0036575/"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Pacific: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3159819545","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc1NjM2NDUzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODgxMDczMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc1NjM2NDUzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODgxMDczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A 10-part mini-series ftelling the intertwined stories of three Marines during America's battle with the Japanese in the Pacific during World War II."</script><metacontent="

My observation is that in The Pacific many of the characters lack depth and development. The result was that I cared less when ill befell them than I did in Band of Brothers. programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0374463, Title: The Pacific, --- Description: The Pacific: With James Badge Dale, Joseph Mazzello, Jon Seda, Ashton Holmes. The Pacific Theatre of World War II, as seen through the eyes of several young Marines." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0374463/","name":"The Pacific","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmEwNmI1MjItNjNjYy00NDE5LWJiNTYtM2QxMTI5ZjllZTBhL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Pacific Theatre of World War II, as seen through the eyes of several young Marines.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0374463/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"gezmek","dateCreated":"2010-09-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Well worth the time","reviewBody":"I enjoyed this series very much and can see why there has been so many comparisons with Band Of Brothers. My observation is that in The Pacific many of the characters lack depth and development. The result was that I cared less when ill befell them than I did in Band of Brothers. I think that the first episode could have contained a lot more time letting us get to know the characters better before throwing them into battle.\n\nThe battle scenes were done very well and played very realistically. All in all HBO has done it again. Without the HBO and Showtime I think that US grown TV drama would be pretty thin on the ground. The Pacific is well worth the time.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":106218,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2010-03-14","keywords":"world war two,pacific theater,japanese soldier,u.s. marine corps,horrors of war","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0197647/","name":"James Badge Dale","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001515/","name":"Joseph Mazzello","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0781218/","name":"Jon Seda"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040938/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005861/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0036575/"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Pacific: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3159819545","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc1NjM2NDUzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODgxMDczMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc1NjM2NDUzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODgxMDczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A 10-part mini-series ftelling the intertwined stories of three Marines during America's battle with the Japanese in the Pacific during World War II."</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 9308346, Title: The Plot Against America, --- Description: The Plot Against America: Created by Ed Burns, David Simon. With Winona Ryder, Anthony Boyle, Zoe Kazan, Morgan Spector. Characters live in an alternative history in which Franklin D. Roosevelt was defeated in the U.S. presidential election of 1940 by Charles Lindbergh." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt9308346/","name":"The Plot Against America","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTk2NzdhMTItMGRmYS00NGQxLTlkMWQtYmI0MWNlNDJjNWMxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Characters live in an alternative history in which Franklin D. Roosevelt was defeated in the U.S. presidential election of 1940 by Charles Lindbergh.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9308346/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"michaeljcummings","dateCreated":"2020-03-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Adaptation of an Excellent Novel","reviewBody":"This is an adaptation of a Philip Roth novel. Philip Roth was a great American novelist, possibly the last great American novelist. He died two years ago at 85. One of his themes is optimism turning to pessimism and then back to a more mature optimism. This is not a flashy story: you are not going to find "The Handmaid's Tale" here, nor any depictions of the Third Reich in the U.S.A. You are going to find a story about how U.S. isolationism could have changed the course of history from 1940 on, with devastating results. You are also going to find the quality of production that was once synonymous with HBO. Having read the book, I can say that the story is going to go in some fairly grim directions. But you shouldn't watch this expecting flash: instead, watch it for a vibrant story, brilliant characterizations, and great themes...such as what it means to be American. It doesn't hurt that some very good actors who have rarely been fully utilized have some excellent material to work with. I think Morgan Spector, Winona Ryder, and especially Zoe Kazan - she is the foundation of the story - are all outstanding.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":9108,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-03-16","keywords":"alternate history,tv mini series,american history,world war two,alternative reality","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000213/","name":"Winona Ryder","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4996269/","name":"Anthony Boyle","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1443740/","name":"Zoe Kazan"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0747900/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0122654/","name":"Ed Burns","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0800108/","name":"David Simon"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi357416729","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRjN2U5ZjgtN2M2Yi00NDc5LWFlMTMtMTcxNmFhOWNjZWM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRjN2U5ZjgtN2M2Yi00NDc5LWFlMTMtMTcxNmFhOWNjZWM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"An alternate American history story of the country's turn to fascism told through the eyes of a working-class Jewish family in New Jersey"</script><metacontent="

With Winona Ryder, Anthony Boyle, Zoe Kazan, Morgan Spector. Characters live in an alternative history in which Franklin D. Roosevelt was defeated in the U.S. presidential election of 1940 by Charles Lindbergh." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt9308346/","name":"The Plot Against America","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTk2NzdhMTItMGRmYS00NGQxLTlkMWQtYmI0MWNlNDJjNWMxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Characters live in an alternative history in which Franklin D. Roosevelt was defeated in the U.S. presidential election of 1940 by Charles Lindbergh.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9308346/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"michaeljcummings","dateCreated":"2020-03-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Adaptation of an Excellent Novel","reviewBody":"This is an adaptation of a Philip Roth novel. Philip Roth was a great American novelist, possibly the last great American novelist. He died two years ago at 85. One of his themes is optimism turning to pessimism and then back to a more mature optimism. This is not a flashy story: you are not going to find "The Handmaid's Tale" here, nor any depictions of the Third Reich in the U.S.A. You are going to find a story about how U.S. isolationism could have changed the course of history from 1940 on, with devastating results. You are also going to find the quality of production that was once synonymous with HBO. Having read the book, I can say that the story is going to go in some fairly grim directions. But you shouldn't watch this expecting flash: instead, watch it for a vibrant story, brilliant characterizations, and great themes...such as what it means to be American. It doesn't hurt that some very good actors who have rarely been fully utilized have some excellent material to work with. I think Morgan Spector, Winona Ryder, and especially Zoe Kazan - she is the foundation of the story - are all outstanding.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":9108,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-03-16","keywords":"alternate history,tv mini series,american history,world war two,alternative reality","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000213/","name":"Winona Ryder","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4996269/","name":"Anthony Boyle","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1443740/","name":"Zoe Kazan"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0747900/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0122654/","name":"Ed Burns","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0800108/","name":"David Simon"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi357416729","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRjN2U5ZjgtN2M2Yi00NDc5LWFlMTMtMTcxNmFhOWNjZWM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRjN2U5ZjgtN2M2Yi00NDc5LWFlMTMtMTcxNmFhOWNjZWM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"An alternate American history story of the country's turn to fascism told through the eyes of a working-class Jewish family in New Jersey"</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 10482370, Title: The Third Day, --- Description: The Third Day: Created by Felix Barrett, Dennis Kelly. With Jude Law, John Dagleish, Mark Lewis Jones, Paddy Considine. A man and a woman make separate journeys to a mysterious island off the British coast." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt10482370/","name":"The Third Day","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjVlMGEzMTctY2U0ZS00M2RmLTlhZGItZTM4MDU1M2Q0YzM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjEwNTM2Mzc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A man and a woman make separate journeys to a mysterious island off the British coast.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10482370/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"wendajones","dateCreated":"2020-10-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Strange but riveting","reviewBody":"I've now watched the first three episodes and want to react before watching the next three. I must say it was very, very strange but very, very alluring viewing. Jude Law was absolutely magnificent, as in fact he always is but here he was just so good. Peculiar camera shots, reality lapses and all sorts of funny things but for Jude Law's performance alone I really enjoyed it. Still not sure about the "meaning" but am not worried about that too much! The next day! So now I've watched the next three episodes and my judgement remains. I can really understand why some people don't appreciate this. We all have really different tastes. But i found it compelling to use a word I don't normally use! In parts so exciting that I had to pause and do something else for a few minutes before continuing. The ending was a little disappointing but I don't know how else it could have ended really. The reality that was created was very gripping and as usual I managed to work in an allegory to some things in our real world! Don't watch if all you want is a straight forward horror movie though!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":9212,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4,"genre":["Drama","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-09-14","keywords":"tv mini series,folk horror,london england,island,causeway","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000179/","name":"Jude Law","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2742856/","name":"John Dagleish","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0428765/","name":"Mark Lewis Jones"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0136967/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0751666/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0716013/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10908075/","name":"Felix Barrett","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2393111/","name":"Dennis Kelly"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3832462873","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmU4MDJiZTYtNTNjNi00NWE0LTgwN2MtNzI0MDk4ODQ4MzZkXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmU4MDJiZTYtNTNjNi00NWE0LTgwN2MtNzI0MDk4ODQ4MzZkXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"Told over two sets of episodes, a man and woman are drawn to a mysterious island off the British coast, where they encounter a group of islanders set on preserving their traditions at any cost."</script><metacontent="

A man and a woman make separate journeys to a mysterious island off the British coast." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt10482370/","name":"The Third Day","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjVlMGEzMTctY2U0ZS00M2RmLTlhZGItZTM4MDU1M2Q0YzM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjEwNTM2Mzc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A man and a woman make separate journeys to a mysterious island off the British coast.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10482370/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"wendajones","dateCreated":"2020-10-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Strange but riveting","reviewBody":"I've now watched the first three episodes and want to react before watching the next three. I must say it was very, very strange but very, very alluring viewing. Jude Law was absolutely magnificent, as in fact he always is but here he was just so good. Peculiar camera shots, reality lapses and all sorts of funny things but for Jude Law's performance alone I really enjoyed it. Still not sure about the "meaning" but am not worried about that too much! The next day! So now I've watched the next three episodes and my judgement remains. I can really understand why some people don't appreciate this. We all have really different tastes. But i found it compelling to use a word I don't normally use! programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 10482370, Title: The Third Day, --- Description: The Third Day: Created by Felix Barrett, Dennis Kelly. With Jude Law, John Dagleish, Mark Lewis Jones, Paddy Considine. A man and a woman make separate journeys to a mysterious island off the British coast." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt10482370/","name":"The Third Day","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjVlMGEzMTctY2U0ZS00M2RmLTlhZGItZTM4MDU1M2Q0YzM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjEwNTM2Mzc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A man and a woman make separate journeys to a mysterious island off the British coast.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10482370/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"wendajones","dateCreated":"2020-10-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Strange but riveting","reviewBody":"I've now watched the first three episodes and want to react before watching the next three. I must say it was very, very strange but very, very alluring viewing. Jude Law was absolutely magnificent, as in fact he always is but here he was just so good. Peculiar camera shots, reality lapses and all sorts of funny things but for Jude Law's performance alone I really enjoyed it. Still not sure about the "meaning" but am not worried about that too much! The next day! So now I've watched the next three episodes and my judgement remains. I can really understand why some people don't appreciate this. We all have really different tastes. But i found it compelling to use a word I don't normally use! In parts so exciting that I had to pause and do something else for a few minutes before continuing. The ending was a little disappointing but I don't know how else it could have ended really. The reality that was created was very gripping and as usual I managed to work in an allegory to some things in our real world! Don't watch if all you want is a straight forward horror movie though!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":9212,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4,"genre":["Drama","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-09-14","keywords":"tv mini series,folk horror,london england,island,causeway","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000179/","name":"Jude Law","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2742856/","name":"John Dagleish","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0428765/","name":"Mark Lewis Jones"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0136967/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0751666/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0716013/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10908075/","name":"Felix Barrett","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2393111/","name":"Dennis Kelly"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3832462873","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmU4MDJiZTYtNTNjNi00NWE0LTgwN2MtNzI0MDk4ODQ4MzZkXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmU4MDJiZTYtNTNjNi00NWE0LTgwN2MtNzI0MDk4ODQ4MzZkXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"Told over two sets of episodes, a man and woman are drawn to a mysterious island off the British coast, where they encounter a group of islanders set on preserving their traditions at any cost."</script><metacontent="

Angels in America
programme.sub-title: S1 E3 S1 E3 Der Bote
programme.desc: Angels in America: With Al Pacino, Mary-Louise Parker, Justin Kirk, Jeffrey Wright. Playwright Tony Kushner adapted his political epic about the AIDS crisis during the mid 1980s and centers the story around a group of disparate but connected individuals." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0318997/","name":"Angels in America","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjJlM2RhNTgtYTQxMy00ZmJkLWIxNDQtOTQzYjg5Y2Y4YjUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc3MjQzNTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Playwright Tony Kushner adapted his political epic about the AIDS crisis during the mid 1980s and centers the story around a group of disparate but connected individuals.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0318997/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"psychopathicgroupie"},"dateCreated":"2004-12-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"a must-see and one of my all-time favorites.","reviewBody":"Angels in America is definitely one of my favorites. I was a loyal viewer when it was on HBO, and rushed out to buy the DVD when it was released. I think this miniseries was very tastefully done. I was delighted to see such diversity in the movie. It was very refreshing to see Jews, Mormons, Protestants, Homosexuals, Heterosexuals, Republicans, and Democrats together. I think this movie was very real in it's portrayal of AIDS, and it really raised awareness for me, because it showed AIDS as a real disease, not just something we hear about on the news. I was very excited to see minorities presented like average, real people. I didn't see the play, so i can't compare. but i was thoroughly pleased with Mike Nichols direction, i think the cast was incredible, and brought life to each character in the best way possible. i think Mary-Louise Parker especially brought with her character, Harper Pitt, something to the play that was very difficult to do. Harper, other than her marriage to Joe, was irrelevant to the story; Parker was able to take the character, though, and make Harper one of the most insightful and endearing characters in the show. I especially like Justin Kirk in this movie. He did not have a particularly challenging part, but he really grabbed my heart in a subtle way. I have heard much criticism directed toward Al Pacino. However, i think Pacino did very well as is character. I have little knowledge of the real Cohn, but Pacinio was able to give Cohn an evil personality, while still keeping the audience aware of how human Cohn really is. It was very interesting. I was also very pleased with the characters of Belize and Mother Pitt. I found Angels in America very inspiring, and after seeing it for the first time, I seemed to see the world in a whole new light. I know that sounds cheesy, but it is true. For someone very passionate about equal rights, like me, this movie seemed to relay exactly what I stand for. If you are an easily offended Conservative, this movie may not be for you, but I recommend this to anyone with an open mind.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":27229,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2003-12-07","keywords":"hiv,death,loneliness,valium,heaven","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000199/","name":"Al Pacino"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000658/","name":"Meryl Streep"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000668/","name":"Emma Thompson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0240889/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005861/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0094563/"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Angels in America","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3786801433","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmY0NDZkNWYtMzk0Zi00ZDZlLTkwODYtNWMwZTVlZWE4ZTcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmY0NDZkNWYtMzk0Zi00ZDZlLTkwODYtNWMwZTVlZWE4ZTcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from HBO Home Video"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0318997, Title: Angels in America, --- Description: Angels in America: With Al Pacino, Mary-Louise Parker, Justin Kirk, Jeffrey Wright. Playwright Tony Kushner adapted his political epic about the AIDS crisis during the mid 1980s and centers the story around a group of disparate but connected individuals." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0318997/","name":"Angels in America","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjJlM2RhNTgtYTQxMy00ZmJkLWIxNDQtOTQzYjg5Y2Y4YjUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc3MjQzNTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Playwright Tony Kushner adapted his political epic about the AIDS crisis during the mid 1980s and centers the story around a group of disparate but connected individuals.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0318997/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"psychopathicgroupie","dateCreated":"2004-12-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"a must-see and one of my all-time favorites.","reviewBody":"Angels in America is definitely one of my favorites. I was a loyal viewer when it was on HBO, and rushed out to buy the DVD when it was released. I think this miniseries was very tastefully done. I was delighted to see such diversity in the movie. It was very refreshing to see Jews, Mormons, Protestants, Homosexuals, Heterosexuals, Republicans, and Democrats together. I think this movie was very real in it's portrayal of AIDS, and it really raised awareness for me, because it showed AIDS as a real disease, not just something we hear about on the news. I was very excited to see minorities presented like average, real people. I didn't see the play, so i can't compare. but i was thoroughly pleased with Mike Nichols direction, i think the cast was incredible, and brought life to each character in the best way possible. i think Mary-Louise Parker especially brought with her character, Harper Pitt, something to the play that was very difficult to do. Harper, other than her marriage to Joe, was irrelevant to the story; Parker was able to take the character, though, and make Harper one of the most insightful and endearing characters in the show. I especially like Justin Kirk in this movie. He did not have a particularly challenging part, but he really grabbed my heart in a subtle way. I have heard much criticism directed toward Al Pacino. However, i think Pacino did very well as is character. I have little knowledge of the real Cohn, but Pacinio was able to give Cohn an evil personality, while still keeping the audience aware of how human Cohn really is. It was very interesting. I was also very pleased with the characters of Belize and Mother Pitt. I found Angels in America very inspiring, and after seeing it for the first time, I seemed to see the world in a whole new light. I know that sounds cheesy, but it is true. For someone very passionate about equal rights, like me, this movie seemed to relay exactly what I stand for. If you are an easily offended Conservative, this movie may not be for you, but I recommend this to anyone with an open mind.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":27229,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2003-12-07","keywords":"hiv,death,loneliness,valium,heaven","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000199/","name":"Al Pacino","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000658/","name":"Meryl Streep","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000668/","name":"Emma Thompson"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0240889/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005861/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0094563/"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Angels in America","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3786801433","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmY0NDZkNWYtMzk0Zi00ZDZlLTkwODYtNWMwZTVlZWE4ZTcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmY0NDZkNWYtMzk0Zi00ZDZlLTkwODYtNWMwZTVlZWE4ZTcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from HBO Home Video"</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0318997, Title: Angels in America, --- Description: Angels in America: With Al Pacino, Mary-Louise Parker, Justin Kirk, Jeffrey Wright. Playwright Tony Kushner adapted his political epic about the AIDS crisis during the mid 1980s and centers the story around a group of disparate but connected individuals." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0318997/","name":"Angels in America","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjJlM2RhNTgtYTQxMy00ZmJkLWIxNDQtOTQzYjg5Y2Y4YjUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc3MjQzNTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Playwright Tony Kushner adapted his political epic about the AIDS crisis during the mid 1980s and centers the story around a group of disparate but connected individuals.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0318997/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"psychopathicgroupie","dateCreated":"2004-12-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"a must-see and one of my all-time favorites.","reviewBody":"Angels in America is definitely one of my favorites. I was a loyal viewer when it was on HBO, and rushed out to buy the DVD when it was released. I think this miniseries was very tastefully done. I was delighted to see such diversity in the movie. It was very refreshing to see Jews, Mormons, Protestants, Homosexuals, Heterosexuals, Republicans, and Democrats together. I think this movie was very real in it's portrayal of AIDS, and it really raised awareness for me, because it showed AIDS as a real disease, not just something we hear about on the news. I was very excited to see minorities presented like average, real people. I didn't see the play, so i can't compare. but i was thoroughly pleased with Mike Nichols direction, i think the cast was incredible, and brought life to each character in the best way possible. i think Mary-Louise Parker especially brought with her character, Harper Pitt, something to the play that was very difficult to do. Harper, other than her marriage to Joe, was irrelevant to the story; Parker was able to take the character, though, and make Harper one of the most insightful and endearing characters in the show. I especially like Justin Kirk in this movie. He did not have a particularly challenging part, but he really grabbed my heart in a subtle way. I have heard much criticism directed toward Al Pacino. However, i think Pacino did very well as is character. I have little knowledge of the real Cohn, but Pacinio was able to give Cohn an evil personality, while still keeping the audience aware of how human Cohn really is. It was very interesting. I was also very pleased with the characters of Belize and Mother Pitt. I found Angels in America very inspiring, and after seeing it for the first time, I seemed to see the world in a whole new light. I know that sounds cheesy, but it is true. For someone very passionate about equal rights, like me, this movie seemed to relay exactly what I stand for. If you are an easily offended Conservative, this movie may not be for you, but I recommend this to anyone with an open mind.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":27229,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2003-12-07","keywords":"hiv,death,loneliness,valium,heaven","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000199/","name":"Al Pacino","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000658/","name":"Meryl Streep","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000668/","name":"Emma Thompson"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0240889/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005861/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0094563/"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Angels in America","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3786801433","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmY0NDZkNWYtMzk0Zi00ZDZlLTkwODYtNWMwZTVlZWE4ZTcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmY0NDZkNWYtMzk0Zi00ZDZlLTkwODYtNWMwZTVlZWE4ZTcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from HBO Home Video"</script><metacontent="

It was very refreshing to see Jews, Mormons, Protestants, Homosexuals, Heterosexuals, Republicans, and Democrats together. Harper, other than her marriage to Joe, was irrelevant to the story; Parker was able to take the character, though, and make Harper one of the most insightful and endearing characters in the show. I think this movie was very real in it's portrayal of AIDS, and it really raised awareness for me, because it showed AIDS as a real disease, not just something we hear about on the news. I was very excited to see minorities presented like average, real people. I didn't see the play, so i can't compare. but i was thoroughly pleased with Mike Nichols direction, i think the cast was incredible, and brought life to each character in the best way possible. i think Mary-Louise Parker especially brought with her character, Harper Pitt, something to the play that was very difficult to do. Harper, other than her marriage to Joe, was irrelevant to the story; Parker was able to take the character, though, and make Harper one of the most insightful and endearing characters in the show. I especially like Justin Kirk in this movie. He did not have a particularly challenging part, but he really grabbed my heart in a subtle way. I have heard much criticism directed toward Al Pacino. However, i think Pacino did very well as is character. I have little knowledge of the real Cohn, but Pacinio was able to give Cohn an evil personality, while still keeping the audience aware of how human Cohn really is. It was very interesting. I was also very pleased with the characters of Belize and Mother Pitt. I found Angels in America very inspiring, and after seeing it for the first time, I seemed to see the world in a whole new light. I know that sounds cheesy, but it is true. For someone very passionate about equal rights, like me, this movie seemed to relay exactly what I stand for. If you are an easily offended Conservative, this movie may not be for you, but I recommend this to anyone with an open mind.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":27229,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2003-12-07","keywords":"hiv,death,loneliness,valium,heaven","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000199/","name":"Al Pacino","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000658/","name":"Meryl Streep","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000668/","name":"Emma Thompson"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0240889/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005861/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0094563/"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Angels in America","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3786801433","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmY0NDZkNWYtMzk0Zi00ZDZlLTkwODYtNWMwZTVlZWE4ZTcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmY0NDZkNWYtMzk0Zi00ZDZlLTkwODYtNWMwZTVlZWE4ZTcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from HBO Home Video"</script><metacontent="

Playwright Tony Kushner adapted his political epic about the AIDS crisis during the mid 1980s and centers the story around a group of disparate but connected individuals." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0318997/","name":"Angels in America","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjJlM2RhNTgtYTQxMy00ZmJkLWIxNDQtOTQzYjg5Y2Y4YjUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc3MjQzNTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Playwright Tony Kushner adapted his political epic about the AIDS crisis during the mid 1980s and centers the story around a group of disparate but connected individuals.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0318997/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"psychopathicgroupie","dateCreated":"2004-12-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"a must-see and one of my all-time favorites.","reviewBody":"Angels in America is definitely one of my favorites. I was a loyal viewer when it was on HBO, and rushed out to buy the DVD when it was released. I think this miniseries was very tastefully done. I was delighted to see such diversity in the movie. It was very refreshing to see Jews, Mormons, Protestants, Homosexuals, Heterosexuals, Republicans, and Democrats together. I think this movie was very real in it's portrayal of AIDS, and it really raised awareness for me, because it showed AIDS as a real disease, not just something we hear about on the news. I was very excited to see minorities presented like average, real people. I didn't see the play, so i can't compare. but i was thoroughly pleased with Mike Nichols direction, i think the cast was incredible, and brought life to each character in the best way possible. i think Mary-Louise Parker especially brought with her character, Harper Pitt, something to the play that was very difficult to do. Harper, other than her marriage to Joe, was irrelevant to the story; Parker was able to take the character, though, and make Harper one of the most insightful and endearing characters in the show. I especially like Justin Kirk in this movie. He did not have a particularly challenging part, but he really grabbed my heart in a subtle way. I have heard much criticism directed toward Al Pacino. However, i think Pacino did very well as is character. I have little knowledge of the real Cohn, but Pacinio was able to give Cohn an evil personality, while still keeping the audience aware of how human Cohn really is. It was very interesting. I was also very pleased with the characters of Belize and Mother Pitt. I found Angels in America very inspiring, and after seeing it for the first time, I seemed to see the world in a whole new light. I know that sounds cheesy, but it is true. For someone very passionate about equal rights, like me, this movie seemed to relay exactly what I stand for. programme.title: Point of Origin
Der Brandstifter
programme.desc: Point of Origin: Directed by Newton Thomas Sigel. With Ray Liotta, John Leguizamo, Colm Feore, Cliff Curtis. Fact-based drama about an arson investigator (Ray Liotta) searching for the perpetrator of a string of deadly fires in 1980s California." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0285917/","name":"Point of Origin","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2NjZGRkYTktZmIxMi00MGFlLTg1NGItNTM4Mjc3NDY2N2ZmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Fact-based drama about an arson investigator (Ray Liotta) searching for the perpetrator of a string of deadly fires in 1980s California.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0285917/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MillandFan"},"dateCreated":"2002-07-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"I expected more","reviewBody":"This film seemed to have rushed to make it's point (who was setting the fires), then dragged on painfully until the end. There was, however, some really good non-reality, or thought scenes that were interesting, until the "Crouching-Tiger, Hidden Dragon" moves were thrown in, and those were completely unnecessary.\n\nI love Ray Liotta. I collect his films, and I have to say that this is one that goes in the collection for the collection's sake. I'll probably not watch it again."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1367,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2002-06-22","keywords":"fire,california,1980s,arson,arson investigator","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Point of Origin","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2862350617","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDM0Y2QxMzgtOWFjYy00NTUzLTk0ZGQtYzNmZThjYmM2NjM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDM0Y2QxMzgtOWFjYy00NTUzLTk0ZGQtYzNmZThjYmM2NjM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000501/","name":"Ray Liotta"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000491/","name":"John Leguizamo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0272173/","name":"Colm Feore"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005875/","name":"Newton Thomas Sigel"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005861/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0079347/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0845860/","name":"Matthew Tabak"}],"duration":"PT1H26M"}</script><metacontent="

The Pacific Theatre of World War II, as seen through the eyes of several young Marines." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0374463/","name":"The Pacific","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmEwNmI1MjItNjNjYy00NDE5LWJiNTYtM2QxMTI5ZjllZTBhL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Pacific Theatre of World War II, as seen through the eyes of several young Marines.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0374463/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gezmek"},"dateCreated":"2010-09-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Well worth the time","reviewBody":"I enjoyed this series very much and can see why there has been so many comparisons with Band Of Brothers. My observation is that in The Pacific many of the characters lack depth and development. The result was that I cared less when ill befell them than I did in Band of Brothers. I think that the first episode could have contained a lot more time letting us get to know the characters better before throwing them into battle.\n\nThe battle scenes were done very well and played very realistically. All in all HBO has done it again. Without the HBO and Showtime I think that US grown TV drama would be pretty thin on the ground. The Pacific is well worth the time.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":106218,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2010-03-14","keywords":"world war two,pacific theater,japanese soldier,u.s. marine corps,horrors of war","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0197647/","name":"James Badge Dale"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001515/","name":"Joseph Mazzello"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0781218/","name":"Jon Seda"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040938/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005861/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0036575/"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Pacific: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3159819545","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc1NjM2NDUzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODgxMDczMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc1NjM2NDUzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODgxMDczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A 10-part mini-series ftelling the intertwined stories of three Marines during America's battle with the Japanese in the Pacific during World War II."}}</script><metacontent="

The Pacific Theatre of World War II, as seen through the eyes of several young Marines." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0374463/","name":"The Pacific","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmEwNmI1MjItNjNjYy00NDE5LWJiNTYtM2QxMTI5ZjllZTBhL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Pacific Theatre of World War II, as seen through the eyes of several young Marines.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0374463/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"gezmek","dateCreated":"2010-09-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Well worth the time","reviewBody":"I enjoyed this series very much and can see why there has been so many comparisons with Band Of Brothers. My observation is that in The Pacific many of the characters lack depth and development. The result was that I cared less when ill befell them than I did in Band of Brothers. I think that the first episode could have contained a lot more time letting us get to know the characters better before throwing them into battle.\n\nThe battle scenes were done very well and played very realistically. All in all HBO has done it again. Without the HBO and Showtime I think that US grown TV drama would be pretty thin on the ground. The Pacific is well worth the time.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":106218,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2010-03-14","keywords":"world war two,pacific theater,japanese soldier,u.s. marine corps,horrors of war","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0197647/","name":"James Badge Dale","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001515/","name":"Joseph Mazzello","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0781218/","name":"Jon Seda"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040938/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005861/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0036575/"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Pacific: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3159819545","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc1NjM2NDUzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODgxMDczMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc1NjM2NDUzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODgxMDczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A 10-part mini-series ftelling the intertwined stories of three Marines during America's battle with the Japanese in the Pacific during World War II."</script><metacontent="

True Blood
True Blood
programme.sub-title: S3 E7 S3 E7 Am Boden der Tatsachen
programme.desc: True Blood: Created by Alan Ball. With Anna Paquin, Stephen Moyer, Sam Trammell, Ryan Kwanten. Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0844441/","name":"True Blood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVjZDQ2N2MtMzMxYy00ZjliLTg5YjAtNjk1OTUwYjVjNWQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0844441/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"skip-98756"},"dateCreated":"2020-05-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Absolutely Superb and Unique Entry in this Genre!","reviewBody":"I just finished watching this amazing vampire series once again..I saw it when it 1st came out and hadnt watched it for a long time..I'd forgotton how it ended and alot of it was like watching for the first time again. This is some Very unique writing and not like any vampire,werewolf,witch show that you have ever seen before..It takes the very difficult path of mixing horror,gore,sexuality, intensity, drama,humor and satire all in one show and it does it extremely well! You feel a bond with each of the characters and there is a great deal of character development over the seasons, so much so that some of the characters become almost polar opposites of what they were when they were 1st introduced..Another fascinating twist is the Bizzare but also Wonderful change in the writing that occurs in the last season..its So Different that you wonder what the heck happenned! The whole tone of the show changes and yes this will disrupt Alot of viewers who expect a continuity of theme thru the show till its end....But....The change ,though radical, is also wonderful..I'd say there is Less humor, less satire, more Intensity, More seriousness in each actors acting which leads to a more dramatic feeling..The gore is still there but its Not as funny, its serious, its intense, and its heart breaking for so many of the characters and they all act it out so well.. Overall, that last season was like watching a Different show but it was Every bit as interesting and entertaining...Now thats something you Dont see very often! I love this show...Sexy,smart, dramatic, satirical and crazy funny at time, heartbreaking at others...What more could you ask of Any show in Any genre? The Final episode covers the full gamut of emotions and wraps things up in a beautiful ending that would bring a tear and a smile to anyone... highly recommended!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":236826,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-09-07","keywords":"human vampire relationship,vampire,witch,shapeshifter,bare breasts","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001593/","name":"Anna Paquin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0610459/","name":"Stephen Moyer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870794/","name":"Sam Trammell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247237/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1494920473","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the full trailer for HBO's original series "True Blood"."}}</script><metacontent="
